timeline.bodyText:
Since fixing koppor issues is seldom, you ask the core developers to apply the linking style after merging the pull requests?
Reason: I would like to have the changelog rendered as
- When an entry is fetched using a DOI, the DOI appears once. Fixes [koppor#8]`

Instead of
- When an entry is fetched using a DOI, the DOI appears once. Fixes https://github.com/koppor/jabref/issues/8`

Similar question arises from normal issues. With the proposed changed syntax, issues won't be autolinked anymore (with plain GitHub without any plugins)

+If you fixed a koppor issue, link it, e.g. "Fixes https://github.com/koppor/jabref/issues/47".
